post.author: 김세환
post.content:
ONE HUNDRED WAYS TO LIVE TO ONE HUNDRED



1.  Enjoy yourself.                26. Eat plenty of fruit.
2.  Stay young at heart.           27. Golf.
3.  Be honest and open.            28. Adopt a pet.
4.  Look for rainbows.             29. Laugh often.
5.  Walk to work.                  30. Be positive.
6.  Take the stairs.               31. Give, don't take.
7.  Keep your curiosity.           32. Marry your sweetheart.
8.  Stop smoking.                  33. Celebrate your marriage.
9.  Listen to your body.           34. Enjoy being single.
10. Watch what you eat.            35. Relax.
11. Watch what you say.            36. Eat your greens.
12. Make time for children.        37. Lawn Bowl.
13. Don't rest on your laurels.    38. Do nothing in excess.
14. Drink lots of water.           39. Do everything in excess.
15. Have faith in others.          40. Chicken noodle soup.
16. Walk in the park.              41. Practice what you preach.
17. Forgive.                       42. Look before you leap.
18. Be an Optimist.                43. Make time for your friends.
19. Make love.                     44. Reduce the amount of
20. Cross-country ski.                 Cholesterol in your diet.
21. Discover Romance.              45. Early to bed, early to rise.
22. Exercise regularly.            46. Don't mope.
23. Do Tai Chi.                    47. Try new things.
24. Try Yoga.                      48. Skinny dip.
25. Plant a garden.                49. Write to a friend.
                                   50. Play tennis.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
51. Commune with Nature.           76. Be generous with hugs.
52. Sing in the car.               77. Make time for your partner.
53. Write a poem.                  78. Keep in touch with family.
54. Whistle while you work.        79. Bake a pie.
55. Read a book.                   80. Eat plenty of fish.
56. Take your medicine as          81. Get plenty of fresh air.
    prescribed.
57. Challenge yourself.            82. Be yourself.
58. Count your blessings.          83. Swim.
59. Indulge yourself.              84. Make time for your grandchildren.
60. \\"Carpe diem\\"(Seize the day).   85. Control your temper.
61. Take setbacks in stride.       86. Share.
62. If you've had a heart attack   87. Take nothing for granted.
    or Stroke and stopped taking   88. Ask your doctor about new
    Medication, speak to your         medications.
    doctor.                    
63. Cuddle.                        89. Power walk at the mall.
64. Use olive oil.                 90. Don't procrastinate.
65. Eat your Brussel sprouts.      91. Accept that which you cannot
66. Lighten up.                      change.
67. Choose a career you love.      92. Don't drink and drive.
68. Be active in your community.   93. Create solutions, not problems.
69. Read the paper every day.      94. Be sociable.
70. Sit up straight.               95. Feed the birds.
71. Keep your mind active.         96. Pamper yourself once a day.
72. Travel.                        97. Go fishing.
73. Soak in the tub.               98. Smile.
74. Don't be jealous.              99. Smell the flowers.
75. Eat an apple a day.            100. Listen to your doctor.


Please send me your hundredth birthday invitation card...

But am I going to be around until then ????
post.title: One hundred ways to live to one hundred.
